snippet: Omar Zakhilwal, Afghanistan’s finance minister, has come under scrutiny for bank records that suggest he accepted sizable payments from businesses and individuals and transferred money to Canada.
abstract: Omar Zakhilwal, Afghanistan's powerful finance minister, comes under scrutiny when an Afghan television network broadcasts copies of two of his bank account statements that show sizable payments from businesses and individuals and transfers of money from those accounts to bank accounts in Canada.

byline.contributor: Sangar Rahimi and Jawad Sukhanyar contributed reporting.

lead_paragraph: Omar Zakhilwal, Afghanistan’s finance minister, has come under scrutiny for bank records that suggest he accepted sizable payments from businesses and individuals and transferred money to Canada.

headline.seo: Afghan Finance Chief Under Scrutiny Over Bank Records
